description: Fills the model column with the visibilities of a calibrator

parameters.name: msname
parameters.info: Name of input visibility file

parameters.name: field
parameters.info: Field Name(s). Comma separated string of field IDs/names

parameters.name: spw
parameters.info: Spectral window identifier (list)

parameters.name: selectdata
parameters.info: Other data selection parameters

parameters.name: timerange
parameters.info: Time range to operate on (for usescratch=T)

parameters.name: scan
parameters.info: Scan number range (for  usescratch=T)

parameters.name: observation
parameters.info: Observation ID range (for  usescratch=T)

parameters.name: intent
parameters.info: Observation intent

parameters.name: scalebychan
parameters.info: scale the flux density on a per channel basis or else on a per spw basis

parameters.name: standard
parameters.info: Flux density standard

parameters.name: interpolation
parameters.info: method to be used to interpolate in time

parameters.name: useephemdir
parameters.info: use directions in the ephemeris table

parameters.name: fluxdensity
parameters.info: Specified flux density [I,Q,U,V]; (-1 will lookup values)

parameters.name: spix
parameters.info: Spectral index of fluxdensity

parameters.name: reffreq
parameters.info: Reference frequency for spix

parameters.name: fluxdict
parameters.info: output dictionary from fluxscale(NB: this is a dictionary)

parameters.name: model
parameters.info: Field model. If using own model, set 'custom_model' to True

parameters.name: custom_model
parameters.info: Set to 'True' if using custom model

parameters.name: listmodels
parameters.info: List the available modimages for VLA calibrators or Tb models for Solar System objects

parameters.name: usescratch
parameters.info: Will create if necessary and use the MODEL_DATA

parameters.name: asynch
parameters.info: If true the taskname must be started using bandpass(...)
